Name: Stop the Bus!
About the game: Let's drive the bus and bring passengers safely to the destination! The bus driver's goal is to pick up every passenger at each bus stop and overcome obstacles on the road! ▶ Spin the mouse roundly to move the bus! ▶ Be careful not to crash against the car coming from other side! ▶ If you go past the bus stop, passengers will complain severely! ▶ If you exceed the speed limit on the speed bump, something scary will happen…! ▶ Travel the road, pick up our passengers, and return safely to the starting point! ▶ Beat yourself with a time attack and break a new record! Caution: If you get out of the road, game will be over. Seriously, driving is not easy.
